name: Marble King
description:
Marble King is a new addictive game.
Getting three stars in every stage to challenge the record

How to play:
1. Touch the direction you want to launch
2. When three or more same color as the beads are removed.
3. Touch the bag can be changed.

Features:
- Fresh and different levels
- Arcade mode to challenge the highest score
- Bombs, arrows and various items
- Adopt all possible operation Easy operation scheme
- Leaderboards, achievements, support
- Tablet Device Support
- Multiplayer support
